languages.text: {n}Маражай щелкает языком.{/n} "Все гемункулы обладают изощренными и ненормальными умами. Но, кажется, я впервые вижу по-настоящему спятившего члена ковена. Смерть не пошла ему на пользу".

traits.locale_text: {n}Маражай щелкает языком.{/n} "Все гемункулы обладают изощренными и ненормальными умами. Но, кажется, я впервые вижу по настоящему спятившего члена ковена. Смерть не пошла ему на пользу".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai clicks his tongue.{/n} "All Haemonculi are endowed with an intellect that is as keen as it is deranged. But this is probably the first coven member I have seen who has well and truly lost his marbles. Dying has not done him any good."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай щелкает языком.{/n} "Все гемункулы обладают изощренными и ненормальными умами. Но, кажется, я впервые вижу по-настоящему спятившего члена ковена. Смерть не пошла ему на пользу".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his tongue.{/n} "All Haemonculi are endowed with an intellect that's as keen as it is deranged. But this is probably the first coven member I've seen who's well and truly lost their marbles. Dying didn't do him well."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋啧了啧舌。{/n}“所有血伶人都拥有敏锐而疯狂的智慧，但他可能是我见过的第一个真的发了疯的血伶人。看得出来，之前死亡的经历让对他没什么好处。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his tongue.{/n} "All Haemonculi are endowed with an intellect that is as keen as it is deranged. But this is probably the first coven member I have seen who has well and truly lost his marbles. Dying has not done him any good."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋啧了啧舌。{/n}“所有血伶人都拥有敏锐而疯狂的智慧，但他可能是我见过的第一个真的发了疯的血伶人。看得出来，之前死亡的经历让他相当不舒服。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai schnalzt mit der Zunge.{/n} "Alle Haemonculi sind mit einem Intellekt gesegnet, der ebenso scharf wie gestört ist. Aber das ist vermutlich das erste Zirkelmitglied, das ich je erlebt habe, das wirklich vollkommen absolut restlos wahnsinnig ist. Der Tod hat ihm nicht gut getan."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his tongue.{/n} "All Haemonculi are endowed with an intellect that is as keen as it is deranged. But this is probably the first coven member I have seen who has well and truly lost his marbles. Dying has not done him any good."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai schnalzt mit der Zunge.{/n} "Alle Haemonculi sind mit einem Intellekt gesegnet, der ebenso scharf wie gestört ist. Aber das ist vermutlich das erste Zirkelmitglied, das ich je erlebt habe, das wirklich vollkommen absolut restlos wahnsinnig ist. Der Tod hat ihm nicht gut getan."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai chasquea la lengua.{/n} «Todos los hemónculos están dotados de un intelecto tan agudo como desquiciado. Pero este ha de ser el primer miembro del cónclave que ha perdido completamente la chaveta. Morir no le ha sentado bien».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his tongue.{/n} "All Haemonculi are endowed with an intellect that is as keen as it is deranged. But this is probably the first coven member I have seen who has well and truly lost his marbles. Dying has not done him any good."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai chasquea la lengua.{/n} «Todos los hemónculos están dotados de un intelecto tan agudo como desquiciado. Pero este ha de ser el primer miembro del cónclave que ha perdido completamente la chaveta. Morir no le ha sentado bien».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai fait claquer sa langue.{/n} « Tous les hémoncules sont aussi intelligents que dérangés, mais c'est sans doute la première fois que j'en rencontre un qui soit totalement fou à lier. Ça ne lui a pas réussi de mourir. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his tongue.{/n} "All Haemonculi are endowed with an intellect that is as keen as it is deranged. But this is probably the first coven member I have seen who has well and truly lost his marbles. Dying has not done him any good."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai fait claquer sa langue.{/n} « Tous les hémoncules sont aussi intelligents que dérangés, mais c'est sans doute la première fois que j'en rencontre un qui soit totalement fou à lier. Ça ne lui a pas réussi de mourir. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは舌打ちする。{/n}「すべてのハモンキュラスには、狂気と同じくらい鋭い知性が備わっている。しかし、俺が見た盟約団のメンバーの中で、本当に正気を失っているのはこいつが初めてだろう。一度死んだところでどうにもならねえ」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his tongue.{/n} "All Haemonculi are endowed with an intellect that is as keen as it is deranged. But this is probably the first coven member I have seen who has well and truly lost his marbles. Dying has not done him any good."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは舌打ちする。{/n}「すべてのハモンキュラスには、狂気と同じくらい鋭い知性が備わっている。しかし、俺が見た盟約団のメンバーの中で、本当に正気を失っているのはこいつが初めてだろう。一度死んだところでどうにもならねえ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, dilini şıklatıyor.{/n} "Haimonkulusların zekâsı keskin, aklı gidik olur derler ama bu... Gördüğüm, kafayı komple sıyırmış ilk meclis üyesi olabilir. Ölmek pek yaramamış anlaşılan."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his tongue.{/n} "All Haemonculi are endowed with an intellect that is as keen as it is deranged. But this is probably the first coven member I have seen who has well and truly lost his marbles. Dying has not done him any good."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, dilini şıklatıyor.{/n} "Haimonkulus zekâsı keskin, aklı gidik olur derler ama bu... Gördüğüm, kafayı komple sıyırmış ilk meclis üyesi olabilir. Ölmek pek yaramamış anlaşılan."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
